extension.name: Events Booking - Auto register
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.description: This plugin auto register registrants of an event into other events

field.name: check_accept_registration
field.label: Check Accept Registration
field.description: If Set to No, the system will ignore accept registration check and always subscribe users to the event, even if that event has registration disabled.

field.name: send_email
field.label: Send Notification Email
field.description: If set to Yes, the system will send notification email to admin and user for every registration which he is auto-registered

field.name: show_on_frontend
field.label: Show on frontend
field.description: If set to Yes, this plugin will be available on frontend event submission form
